pretty-bytes

Convert bytes to a human readable string: 1337 → 1.34 kB

Useful for displaying file sizes for humans.

-

Note that it uses base-10 (eg. kilobyte).
Read about the difference between kilobyte and kibibyte.

Install

sh $ npm install --save pretty-bytes

sh $ bower install --save pretty-bytes

sh $ component install sindresorhus/pretty-bytes

Usage

```js prettyBytes(1337); //=> ‘1.34 kB’

prettyBytes(100); //=> ‘100 B’ ```

CLI

sh $ npm install --global pretty-bytes

```sh $ pretty-bytes –help

Usage pretty-bytes echo | pretty-bytes

Example pretty-bytes 1337 1.34 kB ```
